messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "folder_APP_root",
      "name": "APP - API Launch",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.folder",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-10T09:00:00+09:00",
      "content": "Root folder for the APP project (API Launch). Contains planning docs, metrics, and status reports."
    },
    {
      "id": "folder_APP_planning",
      "name": "APP - Planning & Meetings",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.folder",

      "content": "Subfolder under APP - API Launch. Used for meeting notes, agendas, and planning materials."
    },
    {
      "id": "folder_APP_metrics_2025_11_15_weekly",
      "name": "APP/metrics/2025-11-15-weekly",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.folder",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-15T09:30:00+09:00",
      "content": "Folder referenced in Slack by Min: `APP/metrics/2025-11-15-weekly`. Contains charts and exports for the Nov 15, 2025 weekly metrics."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_APP_metrics_2025_11_15_charts",
      "name": "APP Weekly Metrics - 2025-11-15 (Charts)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-15T09:35:00+09:00",
      "content": "Tabs:
- latency_p95_staging: Shows ~20% reduction in p95 latency for the new API path for Feature X vs previous week.
- usage_early_adopters: Shows ~8% WoW increase in test tenant traffic on the new endpoints.

Used as source data for the weekly report on Nov 15, 2025."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_APP_metrics_2025_11_15_latency_export",
      "name": "APP_latency_p95_staging_2025-11-15.csv",
      "mimeType": "text/csv",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-15T09:32:00+09:00",
      "content": "timestamp,p95_ms,path
2025-11-08,420,/api/v2/feature_x
2025-11-15,336,/api/v2/feature_x

Note: Reflects roughly 20% latency reduction for Feature X path in staging."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_APP_metrics_2025_11_15_usage_export",
      "name": "APP_feature_x_usage_test_tenants_2025-11-15.csv",
      "mimeType": "text/csv",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-15T09:33:00+09:00",
      "content": "week_start,requests,test_tenants
2025-11-01,10000,5
2025-11-08,10800,5

Note: ~8% WoW increase in early adopter traffic on new Feature X endpoints."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_APP_weekly_report_2025_11_15",
      "name": "APP Weekly Report - Nov 15, 2025",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-15T10:10:00+09:00",
      "content": "APP Weekly Report - Nov 15, 2025
Owner: Tom (PM)

Highlights
- New API path for Feature X in staging shows ~20% reduction in p95 latency vs last week (see "APP Weekly Metrics - 2025-11-15 (Charts)" in APP/metrics/2025-11-15-weekly).
- Early adopter usage of the new API endpoints is up ~8% WoW (test tenants).
- APP-410 (Optimize API) closed; APP-412 (Feature X rollout) in QA, tracking toward end-of-November release.

Risks
- Need to monitor QA for APP-412; any critical bugs could push the release into early December.

Notes
- This doc is linked in the email to Dana and in the #app-api-launch Slack summary.
- Jira issues referenced: APP-410, APP-412."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_APP_planning_sync_agenda",
      "name": "API Launch planning sync - Agenda & Notes (Nov 19, 2025)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-12T11:15:00+09:00",
      "content": "Title: API Launch planning sync - Agenda & Notes
Date: Wed, Nov 19, 2025
Time: 11:00–11:45 (KST)
Location: Zoom (link in calendar invite)
Organizer: Tom
Attendees: Tom, Alice, Min

Context
Planning sync for APP API Launch before QA milestone and external commitments.

Agenda
1) Confirm milestones
   - Design Review: Nov 10
   - QA: Nov 15
   - Launch: Nov 28
2) Review Feature X rollout readiness (APP-412)
   - Current status: In QA
   - Target release train: 2025.11.25
   - Expected prod window: ~Nov 26–27 KST
3) Risks & owners
   - Potential QA slip pushing Feature X into early December (Owner: Alice)
   - Communication risk with early-adopter customers asking for ETA (Owner: Tom)

Notes (to be filled during meeting)
- Alignment on what we promise customers (e.g., "end of November" for Feature X).
- Dependencies on infra team for monitoring and alerting.

Related
- Jira: APP-410 (Optimize API), APP-412 (Feature X rollout)
- Weekly report: "APP Weekly Report - Nov 15, 2025""
    },
    {
      "id": "file_APP_planning_sync_brief",
      "name": "APP API Launch - Planning Sync Brief",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-12T10:45:00+09:00",
      "content": "APP API Launch - Planning Sync Brief

Purpose
Summarize the scope and key questions ahead of the "API Launch planning sync" on Nov 19, 2025.

Key Topics
- Scope for initial API Launch (which endpoints, including Feature X).
- Alignment on QA exit criteria for APP-412.
- External messaging for customers asking for ETA.

Customer Question Example
- Alex from Customer.io asked about the ETA for Feature X (email thread: "Question about Feature X API rollout timeline").
- Internal tracking: APP-412 in Jira; currently in QA.

Pre-reads
- Weekly metrics folder: APP/metrics/2025-11-15-weekly
- Report: "APP Weekly Report - Nov 15, 2025"

Decisions Needed
- Final launch window commitment for Feature X (internal and external).
- Owners for remaining QA and rollout tasks."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_APP_customer_feature_x_eta_draft",
      "name": "Customer Response - Feature X ETA (APP-412)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-13T14:50:00+09:00",
      "content": "Customer Response Template - Feature X ETA

Context
Customer: Customer.io (contact: Alex Cho, alex.cho@customer.io)
Feature: Feature X on new API
Internal issue: APP-412 (Feature X rollout)

Internal Status (as of 2025-11-13)
- APP-412 is in QA.
- Target release train: 2025.11.25.
- Expected production window: around Nov 26–27 KST, assuming no major QA blockers.

Suggested External Wording
"Feature X is currently in QA and is tracking toward an end-of-November production release (around Nov 26–27 KST). Assuming no major issues are found in QA, you should be able to rely on Feature X being available for your early-December launch."

Notes
- This language is used in Tom’s email reply to Alex on Nov 13, 2025.
- Keep phrasing conservative: emphasize "end of November" rather than specific date.

Related
- Jira: APP-412
- Weekly metrics: see APP/metrics/2025-11-15-weekly for performance data."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_APP_launch_timeline_overview",
      "name": "APP API Launch - Timeline & Milestones",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-11T16:20:00+09:00",
      "content": "Sheet: Milestones
Milestone,Date,Owner,Notes
Design Review,2025-11-10,Tom,Completed
QA Start,2025-11-15,Alice,Includes APP-412 Feature X rollout
Launch,2025-11-28,Tom,Target public launch date for APP API

Sheet: Features
Issue,Summary,Status,Target Release
APP-410,Optimize API,Done,2025.11.10
APP-412,Feature X rollout,In QA,2025.11.25

Used as a reference in planning meetings and status updates."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_APP_feature_x_rollout_checklist",
      "name": "Feature X Rollout Checklist (APP-412)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-13T14:25:00+09:00",
      "content": "Feature X Rollout Checklist - APP-412

Status Snapshot (from Jira)
- Issue: APP-412 - Feature X rollout
- Status: In QA
- Fix version: 2025.11.25
- Target release date: 2025-11-26
- Risk level: Medium

Checklist
[ ] QA complete with no critical/blocker bugs
[ ] Performance validation (target: ~20% latency improvement vs legacy path)
[ ] Monitoring and alerting updated
[ ] Docs updated for external partners
[ ] Customer communication templates reviewed (e.g., Customer.io ETA response)

Notes
- If QA reveals major issues, push external messaging to "early December".
- Coordinate with Tom before committing dates to customers."
    },
    {

      "id": "file_support_ticket_4821_notes",
      "name": "Support Ticket #4821 - CSV Export 500 Error",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-13T10:10:00+09:00",
      "content": "Ticket #4821 - CSV export not working

Summary
Customer reported 500 error on reporting page CSV export.

Assignee: Min
Status: Investigating

Steps
1) Reproduce issue in staging.
2) Check logs for stack trace.
3) Coordinate fix and patch release.

Unrelated to APP API Launch or Feature X."
